channel.title: Homepage on Cloud Native Day
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Cloud Native Day

item.title: Program
item.description: Program -- Ihor Dvoretskyi, Developer Advocate Cloud Native Computing Foundation VM (Vicky) Brasseur, Director of Open Source Strategy Juniper Networks A well-grounded cloud: Exploring the foundations of Cloud Native Cloud native is now the default architecture for new and evolving software. While the approach has earned its way to the top of the heap, merit isn't the only factor that lead to its success. In this talk I'll explore the foundation that's given cloud native the solid base from which to reach for the skies.

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Schedule 8:30 Sign in, swag, badges 9:00 Luc Perkins Keynote Vicky Brasseur Keynote - A well-grounded cloud: Exploring the foundations of Cloud Native 9:40 Ian Crosby Crossing the Chasm 10:20 Erin Schnabel & Ozzy Osborne What is cloud native anyway? BREAK 11:10 Syed Ahmed The Containerization of Machine Learning: Kubleflow and demo 11:40 Victor Gamov Streams must flow: developing fault-tolerant stream processing application with Kafka Streams and Kubernetes.

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: Merci à nos commanditaires Les organisateurs de la journée Cloud Native 2019 voudraient remercier ses commanditaires sans lesquels cet événement ne serait pas possible. En commanditant la journée Cloud Native, vous aurez la chance de discuter avec des développeurs, des chefs de file du domaine technique et des décideurs provenant d'entreprises de différents secteurs et de toutes les tailles.
